backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files, describing their roles in routing, UI, audio, styling, and assets.
frontend/cleanup-notes-non-frontend.md: Audit notes for non-frontend files, mainly recommending verification before deleting feature_evidence.json.
frontend/cleanup-report.md: Report listing kept and deleted frontend assets with reasons, focusing on storage cleanup and removal of unused files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with custom CSS variables, color tokens, and dark mode definitions.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining the root DOM node and loading the React application.
frontend/README-assets.md: Documentation detailing background images, background music file, playback behavior, diagnostics, and technical implementation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring TanStack Router routes and wrapping them with the error boundary and background audio provider.
frontend/src/assets/staticAssets.ts: Exports fixed paths for the three background images used across the site.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that logs errors and displays a refresh prompt when failures occur.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundAudioP: Provides a context-based background audio player with autoplay attempts, gesture-based playback, mute toggle, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/EnterWebsiteGate: Displays an entry gate screen with animated hearts and triggers background audio on user gesture before showing children.
frontend/src/components/FullscreenBackgr: Renders a full-screen background image with a dark overlay and displays children on top.
frontend/src/components/RomanticButton.t: A stylized romantic button component with configurable size and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/RootLayout.tsx: Basic layout wrapper rendering nested routes via Outlet.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading identities, handling login flow, and managing AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining theme variables, fonts, and custom animations including heart-floating effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root with query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/FinalPage.tsx: Shows a full-screen background with a long romantic message and a signature overlay.
frontend/src/pages/IntroPage.tsx: Displays intro screen with delayed CTA and background, using EnterWebsiteGate and navigating to the proposal page.
frontend/src/pages/ProposalPage.tsx: React page showing a marriage proposal with a background image and a YES button that navigates to /final.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, border radii, animations, and including animate and typography plugins.
project_state.json: JSON describing project state, issues, and feature requests related to autoplay background music using a specific audio file.
